/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene scene of a tree-lined street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving the viewer a sense of looking up at the towering trees that line both sides of the street. The trees, stripped of their leaves, stand bare against the backdrop of a clear blue sky. A few clouds are scattered across the sky, adding to the tranquility of the scene. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire landscape. In the distance, a motorcycle can be seen, adding a touch of life to the otherwise still scene. The image is a beautiful representation of a typical day in Beijing, where nature and urban life coexist harmoniously.
